channel.title: Spam Mail
channel.description:
Hey Mopar,
Well These days I've been getting stupid spam mail bout some religious stuff. Kinda annoying. Post here anything about spam mail :D

item.title: Spam Mail
item.dc:creator: @Anfernio Anfernio
item.description:
@Anfernio wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:29, topic:311950”]If you use a decent email service, like gmail, almost all the spam is classified correctly and you don’t even see it.

Also if you use a decent operating system, like anything but windows, you will never get a virus by clicking on anything.[/quote]

Your idea of a good Operating system?

You’re going to link me to that one thing you link everyone else to, aren’t you?

Read full topic

item.title: Spam Mail
item.dc:creator: @the1337legend the1337legend
item.description:
@the1337legend wrote:

huzzah!

hey! i finaly signed up to myspace lol! i saw your pic online youre cute! lets meet on msn messenger my name there is… paris20lime@hotmail.com …addme to chat! talk to you soon…!!! xoxoxoxox

orlly, i didn’t know my guitar was that cute

item.title: Spam Mail
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote=“B2300 T4nk, post:36, topic:311950”][quote author=Scape-JAVA link=topic=408395.msg3016988#msg3016988 date=1257273989]

[code]
Heyyy!

How are you? was bored so planned to write you.
hows everything going at your end? anyway here you go
im pretty sure, you’re gonna smile after checking it… :>

It’s Easy, Secure and Free!

Try it Now, Click Here

Thanks[/code]

Latest fucking mail.

[/quote] I get spammed by sites I never touched. How they get my email: I clicked on a Google Advertisement about winning a Green Card ( I was stupid -.-) and said my email XD damn Gmail.[/quote]

Same deal.

Read full topic

item.description:

Just delete them.

I keep getting mail about cocks, viagra, lesbian sex, etc.
[/quote][/quote]
Lol, i used to get that too, they somehow stopped now i get mail about “relatives” like, “last night was kewl”, “i missed you at the bar”, “hot myspace pix” with weird links on them.

item.description:

If you use a decent email service, like gmail, almost all the spam is classified correctly and you don’t even see it.

Also if you use a decent operating system, like anything but windows, you will never get a virus by clicking on anything.

item.title: Spam Mail
item.dc:creator: @Anfernio Anfernio
item.description:
@Anfernio wrote:

I believe the last time I had a virus was in 2006, and they stole my full rune (g) on RuneScape and tried deleting my bank PIN.

Haven’t had one since, because I’m not dumb.
